name: ZMALLPOCKETS (Demo)
description:
Manage your inventory. Kill the zombies.

This is a playable but unfinished prototype. Initially started as a Ludumdare 42 entry, but continued developing it for a while after that.

Things you CAN do:
–Pick up items and use them.
–Break boxes to get new items.
–Manage your inventory, picking up and dropping items, since you can only carry two items at once. You can equip things like ammo even if you don't have any fire weapon at the time, to free up the slot.
–Kill zombies.
–Kill birds.

Things you CAN'T do:
–Find the key for the gas station, I didn't get to implement it.
–Get inside the gas station.
–Use the radio to attract zombies.
–Finish the level. After you kill all the zombies and test all the different items, there's nothing else to do.

I lost access to the project files, so this development is on hiatus. I have no idea when I will be able to continue or even if I will. I'm focused on improving my skills and learning to be able to make better games. But I thought it would be cool if people could try this out and tell me if they liked it :)

Known issues: The inventory system may break if you try to pick up two of the same item. The only solution to this is to restart the game.

Thanks for playing!
